name: Lullaby
flavorText: Your audience grows sleepy with your soothing performance.
duration: As long as you play plus 10 minutes Prerequisite: Bard
text: Your performance makes your audience drowsy. Make an Arcana check. The result determines the penalty to Insight checks and Perception checks of each creature that can hear you other than you and your allies.
componentCost: 25 gp, plus a focus worth 20 gp
